attributes.action: Ban cruelty to dairy cattle & slaughter of them and their calves in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Dairy cattle are often tethered to bars in sheds all day unable to move. Scientific studies show mothers and calves are severely emotionally affected by being separated so early & forever - and negative effects such as not interacting w/ others last for their entire lives. For more information & evidence see links 
https://www.ciwf.org.uk/farm-animals/cows/dairy-cows/
https://www.wired.com/2014/06/the-emotional-lives-of-dairy-cows/
https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2015/04/150428081801.htm
attributes.background: So much milk is taken from dairy cattle that many become ill & emaciated & are slaughtered young.  Calves are taken from mothers forever at 1 to 3 days old,have tails & horns removed with hot iron. Male calves are slaughtered.This should be banned & replaced with no slaughter dairies like Ahimsa

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's clear you care about the welfare of diary cattle, but it's not clear exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition asking for a specific change to the laws on keeping dairy cattle in the UK, if that's what you want to happen.
